config.text:
San Bernardino

Pavement Distress Viewer

Road Surface Analysis (RSA) was performed on approximately 150 miles of San Bernardino County-maintained roads. RSA is an ASTM-based PCI analysis to support the County's evaluation of more efficient, technology-driven pavement condition analysis.
This analysis is based upon Cyclomedia imagery and LiDAR captured in 2020-2021. Current images (2023) may show that the roadway conditions have improved OR worsened since the analysis was performed.
